TopicTitle: KOrion Capsule -- First Mesh Developed for Mod Work

Articles.Content: In what world is that not good enough? It looks awesome! But I wont stop you if you want to continue on developing. I'm just saying it's already looking slick
I'm second want panzerknoef is saying, this looks amazing. But if you want to improve it more it is your call

It looks fine to me, better than any capsule I've seen so far. How does it behave when the textures are set on 1/2, 1/4 and 1/8?

Not to be a party pooper, but when your capsule or astronauts look like the picture, someone has made a boo-boo

That's not how chorion normally looks like. Here's a famous photograph (Nilsson, 1965.) that shows what I'm talking about.

Therefore, the name is highly appropriate.

Hey guys --

Thanks for the kind words. I'm hoping to get the textures as clean and as tight as the FASA products, but I we'll see what my work schedule will allow.

As it is, I have to make a .cfg fix: Discovered on my second flight (I couldn't resist. ) that I forgot to setup a hatch for an EVA. D'oh!

The heat shield looks a bit strange in one picture- the reflectivity of it almost makes it look like someone stretched a black plastic garbage bag over it. Other than that, it looks utterly fantastic.

Nice!

I agree that the specular maps might be a little too strong, on the heat shield and the white parts where it looks a little more grungy than it should.

Have you thought of using the SDHI Service Module pack? It comes with a docking port with built in drouge and main parachutes. A quick MM rescale should make it 3m.

By the way how are your plans for parachutes? I would really like to see a dockingport/parachute module with a main/ drogue system using RealChute. I guess to save time you could use sumghai's SDMHI Service Module Mod, like Read have Read suggested . As this features a IACBM dockingport with chutes and a Orion Style Service Module, you only would need to rescale it so it fits I'm sure sumghai would have no problems to allow you to include his parts.

Read have Read: I'm going to see what I can do about toning down the spec map on the heat shield. Right now I'm using my normal as a Bump/Spec combo, and it's a little too strong for my liking.

As for the grunge, that was actually deliberate. The Orion was originally intended to be largely re-usable, and I wanted to mimic the thermal blanket wear-and-tear seen on the shuttles after several flights. (I've even considered using my thermal blanket bump method to create a custom bump map for Helldiver's amazing KSO, but I'll get to that when I have time.)

DasBananenbrot: Honestly, that's been a big question. Right now the capsule is just a pod. The truth of the matter is that the forward RCS hatch should split off and the chutes should extend from the top of the capsule after re-entry. As this is my first mod, however, I'm still struggling with putting a bloody hatch on the capsule.

In short, no specific plans yet. Crawling before I can walk, etc..

Still working on nodes and surfacing. In the meantime, my son has been knocking out more SLS mesh pieces. Lots more images to come, but here is a quick LW render of the partially-surfaced stack.

Good News: He's flown it in game.

Bad News: We're getting smoothing errors from the OBJs generated by LightWave. Bugger.

More to come.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Looks amazing

Now, the real question is:

Circular panels, or rectangular panels?

Please, keep this going! I'd love to see an SLS mod, ever since the Industrial Flames and Explosives mod...

So sad it's gone

Now, the real question is:

Circular panels, or rectangular panels?

Please, keep this going! I'd love to see an SLS mod, ever since the Industrial Flames and Explosives mod...

So sad it's gone

I would vote for Rectangular panels all the way. Mainly because I think those circular panels were dropped as a design choice after Constellation was cancelled..... Currently ESA wants to make a Service Module for Orion which will be also the main body of their new ATV which shows at least in concept graphics rectangular panels. So I think , this is the way to go

I want those circular panels, if for nothing other than it's so f'ing cool!!!

For the record, this mod is great!

Edited February 23, 2014 by Mr. Pseudonym
Damint brackets!

This looks amazing! Those bump/normal maps are ridiculously amazing!

Just one small inconsequential question though, are you going to make an RS-25-esque engine for the bottom? Or an original design? Either way, I'm sure it's gonna be epic!

Keep up the good work fellas!
Shameless bump to see if you still are going on this. Hope that this comes through!
Would be excellent timing as in the upcoming update we get the faux SLS. Time to get the real one too, especially one so beautiful as this one.
wow its been awhile and yeah this would fit well with the new SLS
Yeah would be nice to see epecially the capsule , I am actually a bit dissappointed they didn't made a stock 6 kerbal capsule to go with SLS styled rocket parts....

Yeah would be nice to see epecially the capsule , I am actually a bit dissappointed they didn't made a stock 6 kerbal capsule to go with SLS styled rocket parts....

They probably will when we have a reason to sent large amounts of Kerbals on missions.

Personally, I just use shuttles or SSTOs for any crew transfer larger than 3 crew.

One single word: WOAH!. Amazing.
